Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/94th
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Mackinaw, Harbor, South Chicago, 95th and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/94th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Mackinaw, Harbor, South Chicago, 95th and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/94th.

Allow extra travel time.
